successes.title: Impression π: Wireless VR+AR with Gesture+Position Tracking
successes.description: A Wireless Virtual Reality HMD that's Fashionable & Compact; Features 3D Gesture Input, Position Tracking, & Augmented Reality Overlays

Pledges.description: Thank you for supporting our mission to build the next generation of mobile VR+AR experience.

Customize your very own VR faceplate (with beautiful Pi logo) to decorate your VR headset. We’ll also sign you up to the Pi Fan Club for exclusive Impression Pi updates, including videos and photos of our progress. We will send you email with details on how to customize it.

Early Bird Special—Impression Pi Starter Pack: You’ll receive a fashionable headset for your mobile phone +VR faceplate. You can later upgrade to the Empower edition by purchasing the integrated high performance vision+IMU board.

Impression Pi Starter Pack: You’ll receive a fashionable headset for your mobile phone +VR faceplate. You can later upgrade to the Empower edition by purchasing the integrated high performance vision+IMU board.

Impression Pi Core Package -- the core sensor module of Pi: You’ll receive the integrated board with Camera Sensing/Vision control module and high performance IMU —for DIY lovers to build your own interactive VR/AR headsets, robots, or drones

Early Bird Special—Impression Pi Empower Package: You’ll receive a completed, interactive VR headset, with an integrated board embedded. The board contains camera sensing/vision control model and IMU.
Impression Pi Empower Package: You’ll receive a completed, interactive VR headset, with an integrated board embedded. The board contains camera sensing/vision control model and IMU.

Impression Pi Developer’s Edition -- Early delivery: Impression Pi Empower Package + Full SDK + enrollment in the Pi Developers Program to get special support from the team. Submit content for the Pi Store. This special Pi package is for hardcore Pi lovers

Impression Pi All-in-One Master: If you have a smartphone that is not listed on the page, no worries. We offer a nice integrated Master package!  You’ll get an all-in-one integrated headset with a built-in display and completed interactive system.
Couple Package: 2X Impression Pi Empower, with two faceplates of your choice.
Family Package: 4X Impression.Pi Empower and four faceplates of your choice.
Collector’s Package: Impression.Pi Empower, all three faceplates, Impression Pi Core, Impression Pi Starter, and Impression Pi Master.
Partnership Package x5: 5X Impression.Pi Empower (including one faceplate), and you’ll get to meet our team and tour our R&D facilities in the Bay Area (US) or Hangzhou (China).
Partnership Master Package x5: 5X Impression Pi Master pack (including one faceplate), and you’ll get to meet our team and tour our R&D facilities in the Bay Area (US) or Hangzhou (China).
Partnership Package x10: 10X Impression Pi Empower (including one faceplate), and you’ll get to meet our team and tour our R&D facilities in the Bay Area (US) or Hangzhou (China).
